column4: Is it possible to view my ubuntu machine's Desktop or whatever via a windows computer across the web? If so, how would i go about enabling it?
yes, you just have to go to System>Preferences>Remote Desktop..... then you can download tightvnc to the windows maching and access your ubuntu
i have a VPN linksys router model number: WRV54G. Will i need to enable port forwarding on the router?
